activities:
Button offers a Platform that enables smart connections between mobile apps that drive installs, increase engagement and facilitate mobile commerce. Button's Platform is enabled on mobile apps where a mobile app developer Client chooses to install our SDK. We collect information from Users that download and use apps with Button’s SDK installed in order to faciliate our Platform and Service. This information includes information collected from mobile devices such as advertising identifier (IDFA, Android ID), IP address and the device make and model. We also collect location information from mobile devices. Button enables mobile app developer Clients to pass us certain information about their Users including email address and telephone number. Button also may collect personal data pursuant to a User Rewards program for the purpose of administering that program.

Button also collects personal data such as email address and telephone number from the Website when Users choose to provide it to us or the purpose of answering questions or addressing User concerns.
